description.monsterText: barks loudly!

description.text: On the downside, you have rabies. On the upside, so does the next diggle you bite!
You're a little hyperactive. Any sudden movements have a chance of sending you into a brief paralyzing fit.
description.monsterText: playfully rolls around.

description.text: How could you?!
Why does everybody hate you so much?

description.monsterText: absorbs you into its shiny goodness.

description.text: The further you stray from the Glorious Loot, the more its call pulls at your mind!
Let's be clear: You didn't stub your toe ON the snail, you stubbed your toe trying to AVOID it and this makes you HOPPING MAD.

description.monsterText: inches forward agonisingly slowly.

description.text: Were those zorkmids? Did that yeek have zorkmids? You could have sworn you heard zorkmids. You like zorkmids.

description.monsterText: sniggers to itself.
wonders if trying THIS will work.

description.text: You are temporarily dead. This didn't stop Lord Dredmor and it's not going to stop you. Good thing this didn't happen in a different dungeon ...

description.monsterText: zaps a wand of death. --More--
points an eyestalk at you and slowly curls it.
slaps your face with one open eyestalk.

description.text: Ectoplasm is clogging part of your mana supply, and that gunk takes forever to clean out.
As to floating eyes, let them float.
description.monsterText: gazes at you.

description.text: Your magical energies have been barely suppressed by anti-magical energy forces.
You feel so ... free without all those unnatural defences weighing you down.
description.monsterText: gazes at you.

description.text: You've met with a terrible fate, haven't you?

description.monsterText: gazes at you.
flippantly smashes through the dungeon!

description.text: The presence of a greater being has left you slackjawed. Circular!
The presence of a greater being has left you inspired. To kill. Hmm.
You feel dirty all over. Even the thought of food makes you queasy.
All those monsters are literally trying to kill me! How is that paranoid? What do you know, buff title? Who hired you for this?! TELL ME!
Its lusty smile and longing gaze has pierced your heart and set it on fire. Oh no wait that was an arrow.

description.monsterText: raises its horn.
mutters an apology and clears your personal space.
pauses to slaughter a helpless diggle hovel. Level up!
summons an icy gale!
throws an icicle!
showers acid!

description.text: This is your brain on drugs.
description.monsterText: squirts acid!
channels lightning!

description.text: You are in a dungeon! You're not sure how this is even possible, but it can't be a good thing.
description.monsterText: brews stormy clouds above you.
coats itself in acid armour.
summons walls of light around itself.

description.text: Thick tentacles constrict your movement and make deflecting attacks almost impossible. ... You kinda like it.

description.monsterText: plunges a thick tentacle towards you!
writhes tentacles over nearby objects.
gropes with an unprotected, infested tentacle!
lashes you with underfoot tentacles!
snatches at your belt ... with tentacles!
chills the heart of another creature.
crashes an implausibly large mechanical foot through the roof!

description.text: And people chop these things down? Madness!
And people chop these things down? Madness!
The hills have eyes but today they're yours.
The hills have eyes but today they're yours.
Millions of microscopic mystic organisms could be starving right now because of the magic you're chanelling, so what's one more BBQed diggle?
Millions of microscopic mystic organisms could be starving right now because of the magic you're chanelling, so what's one more BBQed diggle?
Stretchy roots are sprouting over your legs! Moving will break free, but release agonising toxins.
(This is a dummy buff.)

description.monsterText: curls back into the ground.

description.text: What the ... hey! That's a mimic in your UI! Get down from there!

description.monsterText: gives up and goes home. Unrelated, you notice a perfectly safe fountain!

description.text: They could be anything. They could be everything. They could be you.
Maaaaaan, why'd they have to lock the dungeon exit after you? At least a few good strikes should work your motivation levels back up.
Ugh, why does your one foot have to be so far ahead of the other every time. You can't keep your eyes open much longer.

description.monsterText: casts a heart-stopper!
fires a glowing beam!

description.text: You're absolutely glowing with positive energy! You should see a doctor about that.

description.monsterText: stomps a firm foothold into the ground.
grasps his bloodied amulet in one hand.
adopts a firm battle stance.
launches an aethereal bomb!
feels a sanctimoniousness tirade bubbling inside itself!

description.text: ... just like us!

description.monsterText: crackles as its power slowly drifts from its grasp.

description.text: DON'T LOOK JUST MOVE MOVE MOVE.
An otherworldly monstrosity stalks you through the universe's slowly closing scars.
description.monsterText: gashes open space-time and beckons an eldritch assassin towards you!
serenely steps into a rift through reality.
begins opening a gateway to a plane of pure aethereal energy!
plucks free and launches a poison stinger!
bucks its holy aura away from its body!
splashes away precious, near-freezing water!
transmutes a handful of coins into damage, discarding the rest of the bag!
vomits up a stream of inner flames!
cries out 'Fight on, my monstrous brothers!'
cries out 'Go forth and crush the diggle-slayer!'
cries out 'Formation raven three, on my mark!'

description.text: What did all those poor creatures ever do to you? Other than the Thrusty, I mean.
description.monsterText: cries out 'What are we really doing here, old friend?'
invokes the dire call of the Random Number God.

description.text: Tomb raiding sucks when it's your tomb.
description.monsterText: entombs you within its dungeon.
crashes the dungeon! Loading last autosave ...
generates wandering mobs.
fumbles with a bubbling flask, shattering it at your feet.
very, very carefully places a humming potion on the floor then backs away.
spins around, startled, as a conical ooze flops out of its backpack.

effect.name: Glyph of the Eye of Ra

description.text: Thick black lines rot themselves deep into your flesh. Worse, this signal was written in Comic Sans!
description.monsterText: traces a seering signal over your chest!
wails as a foul energy rips it away from the afterlife.

description.text: It feels like a diggle is drilling its way out of your face because your face is on fire.
description.monsterText: uses a ghostly limb to stab you in the back from the front!
sets up a trap nearby.

spell.name: Ready To Unleash The Fallen B

description.text: A single freed soul bobs gratefully around your head, not for one moment requesting that you listen.
One soul, two soul, red soul, blue soul. Actually they're both kinda yellow.
Three. Three freed souls, ah ha ha! It feels good to be a hero sometimes.
You've practically freed a whole posse of souls now, you little altruist, you.
Free ALL the souls!
Free all the souls?
Seven souls dance nonstop in circles around you. They're not ... going away any time soon, are they.
Stupid souls buzzing all over your face. Shoo! Don't you things have a heaven to go to?
A myriad of souls hum pleasantly to themselves as they watch you from above, waiting.
Oh God, here we go again.
You're a HR, durr.
What could all these spirits possibly be saying???
The spirits of past heroes are lending you their power. Now is the time to vanquish Dredmor forever!

effect.spell: Ready To Unleash The Fallen B

description.monsterText: shares a candy bar with you.
throws a shin-kicking hissy fit!
pulls a face at the silly monsters.
goes exploring on her own.

description.text: You stumble over your words for a moment as your body resists the demoness's gaze. It's like prom all over again.
It's surprisingly delicious, but now your tongue is stuck to your eyebrows and that never helps anything.
description.monsterText: gets all over you!
grows from a fresh corpse and slimes towards a larger pile.

description.text: This is way worse than that time your brother gave you a swirly!
description.monsterText: latches onto a leg and pulls you into the water!
dives underwater.

description.text: This seems like a perfectly natural meteorological phenomonom.
Ha ha! ... Okay, hold on, if that loop goes around there ... unless you sort of just wiggle ...
Amateurs. You can boy scout your way out of this net early if you just stop struggling for a few turns. (This foreign material cancels invisibility!)
description.monsterText: throws a weighted net!

description.text: You have a fresh new limb, butchered from an animal. It's not all that exciting a material, but at least it's similar enough to heal quickly.
You have a fresh new limb, butchered from an animal. It's not all that exciting a material, but at least it's similar enough to heal quickly.
You have a fresh new limb, butchered from an animal. It's not all that exciting a material, but at least it's similar enough to heal quickly.
You have a fresh new limb, butchered from an animal. It's not all that exciting a material, but at least it's similar enough to heal quickly.
You have a fresh new limb, butchered from an animal. It's not all that exciting a material, but at least it's similar enough to heal quickly.
You have a fresh new limb, looted from a construct. Protecting your squishier parts has never been easier!
You have a fresh new limb, looted from a construct. It comes with auto-targeting software!
You have a fresh new limb, looted from a construct. This'll keep you standing longer!
You have a fresh new limb, looted from a construct. You installed some extra Magic Access Memory!
You have a fresh new limb, looted from a construct. It constantly scans for anomalies in the dungeon!
You have a fresh new limb, prepared from a vegetable. Your foes will never reach desert!
You have a fresh new limb, prepared from a vegetable. And it's going right down the monsters' throats!

spell.name: Vegetables Are Good For You B

effect.spell: Vegetables Are Good For You B

description.text: You have a fresh new limb, prepared from a vegetable. Let's see those fat swarmies keep up with you now!
You have a fresh new limb, prepared from a vegetable. Nobody wants to eat you anymore!
You have a fresh new limb, prepared from a vegetable. They really do let you see in the dark!
You have a fresh new limb, stitched from an undead. It shields you from the elements!
You have a fresh new limb, stitched from an undead. Neither life nor death can stop your blows!
You have a fresh new limb, stitched from an undead. It grounds you both metaphorically and literally!
You have a fresh new limb, stitched from an undead. You're sopping up nasty puddles like nobody's business!
You have a fresh new limb, stitched from an undead. Breathing is for the weak!
Insomuch as a presence of light can be considered fiendish, this glow is fiendish.
You have a fresh new limb, stolen from a demon. Being struck only makes it glow stronger!
You have a fresh new limb, stolen from a demon. Rip and tear!
You have a fresh new limb, stolen from a demon. Booze sinks into it and ... changes!
You have a fresh new limb, stolen from a demon. It strikes out wildly when threatened!
You have a fresh new limb, stolen from a demon. Your magic spells are especially violent now!
You have a fresh new limb, formed from something Other. Magic just bounces right off it!
You have a fresh new limb, formed from something Other. Where you point, spells go. No exceptions!
You have a fresh new limb, formed from something Other. You stand more firmly in the aether than ever before!

spell.name: No You Are The Bouncy Castle

playerHitEffectBuff.name: No You Are The Bouncy Castle

description.text: You have a fresh new limb, formed from something Other. Earthly pests find this difficult to nibble on!
You have a fresh new limb, formed from something Other. You can see the mysteries of the aether clearly now!
You lack a shield arm. This makes deflecting blows ... difficult. Hopefully you'll find a replacement limb soon.
You lack a sword arm. This makes stabbing monsters ... difficult. Hopefully you'll find a replacement limb soon.
You lack a weight-bearing leg. This makes staying upright ... difficult. Hopefully you'll find a replacement limb soon.
You lack a balancing leg. This makes avoiding monsters ... difficult. Hopefully you'll find a replacement limb soon.
You lack a head. This makes careful thinking ... difficult. Hopefully you'll find a replacement limb soon.
The presence of a greater being has left you inspired. To kill. Hmm.
Is this the real life? Is this just fantasy?

description.monsterText: releases a burst of sweet-smelling spores into the wind.
yells 'Obvious Fireball!' and lobs a makeshift bomb.
yells 'Fleshbore!' and lobs an acid flask.
yells 'Corpus Burst!' and shoots a poison bottle bolt.
scavenges for ammunition.

description.text: All your experiences have been for nothing oh god why why why. (Fight monsters in melee to restore ego!)
WARNING: Ego inflation at dangerously low levels. Fight monsters in melee to reinflate.
Ouch! Right in your secret childhood fantasies! How could it have known?
description.monsterText: points with its ears and laughs at your feeble human ancestry.

description.text: My wallet? But that's where I keep my zorkmids!
description.monsterText: snatches at your wallet.

description.text: How could you?!
Amateurs. You can boy scout your way out of this net with your eyes closed.
Its lusty smile and longing gaze has pierced your heart and set it on fire. Oh no wait that was a bolt.
If God didn't want you to shoot down these fiends, then why did He give you all these arrows? Huh?! (This buff actually lasts 2 turns, stacks and is lost after melee contact.)
You're a little hyperactive. Any sudden movements have a chance of sending you into a brief paralyzing fit.
You've met with a terrible fate, haven't you?
Now what did your mother always say about running with sharp objects?
Ouch! This one sure has a kick to it.
You're not levitating, you're jumping with style!
Oowwww ... You really have to stop leaping around while you're swinging this stupid-large hammer.
You are filled with an unreasonably high level of bravado. Running away now will *hurt*.
(This is a dummy buff.)
With great power comes even greater nerfs.

spell.name: Genocide Fruit Treant of Knowledge Kill
Genocide Fruit Treant of Knowledge Dot

effect.spell: Genocide Fruit Treant of Knowledge Kill
Genocide Fruit Treant of Knowledge Dot

spell.name: Genocide Fruit Treant of Knowledge Hit

effect.spell: Genocide Fruit Treant of Knowledge Hit

description.text: Terrible energies flow through your fingertips, ready to banish the next species of monster you touch. Try not to scratch your nose.
Your magical vantage point and clever thinking have combined to put you in just the right place at the right time!
Oh! You can see a better tactical position elsewhere; move quickly to take advantage of it!
(This is a dummy buff.)
Your eyeballs feel like they're floating high above your body. Huh? What are all those numbers down there?
Your magical energies have been faintly irritated by anti-magical energy forces.
You aren't wanted. Poor you.
Why didn't you think to bring spare batteries into the dungeon with you? Why?!
Voltaic energy sizzles your skin.
If you play with fire, you're going to get burned. If you play with the demonic underside of the fabric of existence ...
Get it off get it off get it off!
Arrows sure are annoying.
Daaang hero, your weapon is just and 'nope'ing all over you!
